Requires at least: 3.3
Tested up to: 3.3.1
Stable tag: trunk

Displays an improved recent drafts widget on the dashboard

== Description ==

Activate the plugin and all users who can edit other users posts (editors and admins) will get a new widget on their dashboard showing all draft and pending posts, pages and any custom post types. The standard 'Recent Drafts' widget is disabled.

This makes no changes for subscribers, contributors and authors.

== Installation ==

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

1. Go to the Plugins page in the admin area, search for `Better Recent Drafts` and install it.
1. *Or* Extract `better-recent-drafts.zip` in the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory. This will create a subfolder called `better-recent-drafts` containing the plugin files.
1. Activate the `Better Recent Drafts` through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress

== Frequently Asked Questions ==

= Where are the options? =

There are no options at the moment. Just activate the plugin and all users who can edit others posts (editors and admins) will get a new widget on their dashboard showing all draft and pending posts, pages and any custom post types.
